# Problem 1

## Create a data frame
```{r}
set.seed(1)

df = tibble(
  random_sample = runif(10, min = 0, max = 5),
  vec_logical = (random_sample > 2),
  vec_char = c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "a", "b", "c", "d", "e"),
  vec_factor = c("A", "B", "C", "D", "E", "a", "b", "c", "d", "e")
)
```
